entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
